dialogOption.texten: 911, what's your emergency?
I'm going to die!
What happend to you?
I cut myself! Oh my god. . . . . . I'm going to lose my arm, isn't it so? . . . . . . . I shouldn't look at it...
Can you try to look at your injury?
With what did you cut yourself?
I don't think so.. you know . . . . . I fear that I will faint as soon as I look at it.
Alright, you don't have to, if you don't want.
You have to, otherwise I don't know how serious your injury is.
. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . Oh, it is only a small wound! I think I don't need any help. Just a plaster.
Oh! I can tell you that. It was a small butter knife.
Is it sharp?
No, it is actually blunt.
{NO EMERGENCY} If thats the case, then you just have to dress your wound. I hope you understand that I can't send you an ambulance for a small wound.
{SEND AMBULANCE} I can send an ambulance if you want.
{ADDRESS} Where are you?
. . . . . I'm currently at . . . . . . Wait . . . . . . . Where am I, ah right. At [[ADDRESS]].
When did it happen?
It was just one or two minutes ago, I called you at once!
Who's fault is it?
It was me . . . . . . . . Just a terrible accident.
An ambulance will be soon with you.
Of course, I understand. I think I can help myself. Thank you!
Thanks a lot!
Sure, glad I could help.
He really fainted...
I am going to die . . . . . . . . . . .

reportElement.texten: You send an ambulance, although it was just a small cut.
